name: Cactus Block on adventure!
description:
This is the sister game to my other GMTK jam entry, Cactus Block on everyday!!

It expands the game from a simple score attack / time attack game with a single level, to a game with multiple levels where the goal is to clear all levels.

Explanation

This is an adventure game. Clear all 6 stages in one go.

Controls

Arrow Keys or WASD: Move

Up, W, X, or Spacebar: Jump

Down or S: ???

Left Mouse Click: Place a Block or Cactus. Which one? I don't knooow....

C or Control: Declare your intent to complete the stage. Requires Point Stick x 1. Point Sticks are earned every 1000pts or by getting all Fruits.

  • A Star will appear in the world. Collect the Star to win the game.
  • All items become worth 2x points when the Star is active.
  • If you die, the Star vanishes and all Blocks and Cacti vanish.
If you get softlocked...

You forfeit the game. Refresh your browser and try again.
